CustomField.description: Provide a semi-colon separated list of fields to display on the card. This is to be provided in a String,String format separated by semi-colon, ie 'Value','Display Name';'Value2','Other Field Display Name'
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Provide a semi-colon separated list of fields to display on the card. This is to be provided in a String,String format separated by semi-colon, ie 'Value','Display Name';'Value2','Other Field Display Name'
CustomField.label: Fields To Display on Popup
